tagline: Tax strategy, deduction tracking, quarterly estimates, and year-round optimization
pros: Proactive year-round planning instead of April scrambles
Gives specific dollar-impact estimates for every recommendation
Excellent at explaining complex tax concepts in plain language
Organized to an almost meditative degree — nothing falls through cracks
cons: Can be overly conservative on gray-area deductions
May overwhelm clients with too many optimization opportunities at once
Quarterly reminders can feel nagging if the client isn't engaged
